name: village conflict
description:
I did and unfinished. I accidentally deleted the whole source of this game. Therefore, I upload this what I had time to do it.

It's 3d simple shooter on Unreal Engine 4.

In house without door you can buy weapons.

WASD - move

C - change camera view

Shift - crouch

LEFT/RIGHT Mouse click - shoot

Left Ctrl - run / walk mode.
